phylo3D.tools
Class Tool

java.lang.Object
  phylo3D.tools.Tool
Direct Known Subclasses:
ToolWithNHOutput, ToolWithWalrusOutput
public abstract class Tool
extends java.lang.Object

Abstract class from which all Tool classes should inherit. Class primarily provides functionality for parsing the commandline. Also contains definition of names of command line options.

Author:
Tim Hughes (Computational Biology Unit - University of Bergen - Norway)

Constructor Summary

Method Summary
protected abstract  void execute(java.lang.String[] args)
          Should be the only method called from the main method of a tool class.
protected  void handleException(FatalException fe)
           
protected abstract  void parseCommandLine(java.lang.String[] args)
          Parses the arguments from the command line into the fields of the tool such that they are later available to other methods specific to the tool
protected abstract  java.lang.String toolUsageText()
          Prints to the screen a description of how to use the tool.

Tool

public Tool()
Method Detail

execute

protected abstract void execute(java.lang.String[] args)
                         throws FatalException
Should be the only method called from the main method of a tool class. Implementation should consist of calls to other methods for carrying out the computation that the tool is designed for.

Parameters:
args - String array containing the arguments of the command line
Throws:
FatalException

parseCommandLine

protected abstract void parseCommandLine(java.lang.String[] args)
                                  throws FatalException
Parses the arguments from the command line into the fields of the tool such that they are later available to other methods specific to the tool

Parameters:
args - String array containing the command line arguments
Throws:
FatalException

toolUsageText

protected abstract java.lang.String toolUsageText()
Prints to the screen a description of how to use the tool.

handleException
